scripts.deploy:mainnet: npm run prepare:mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ opynfinance/gamma-mainnet
scripts.deploy:mainnet-internal: npm run prepare:mainnet-internal && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ opynfinance/playground
scripts.deploy:kovan: npm run prepare:kovan && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ opynfinance/gamma-kovan
scripts.deploy:kovan-internal: npm run prepare:kovan-internal && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ opynfinance/gamma-internal-kovan
scripts.deploy:ropsten: npm run prepare:ropsten && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ opynfinance/gamma-ropsten
